name: kazad
text: Did the snake deserve to die?

name: spectre
text: Yes, he ate Little Freddie.

name: _cheesekayke
text: A comment left by _cheesekayke was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MrMojoRisin, Overmedicated, BPMead, novacaine, Audhumla, joamiq)

name: deus
text: Anyone eating up Todd like squirrels gets a whiskey in my book.

name: rowboat
text: Say what you will about Todd - the dude's up on his cautionary folk fables.

name: lawbot
text: Todd has mad racism against animals like snakes and dogs.

name: mercuri0us
text: animalism.

name: sonicscream2
text: Yes

name: kahrytes
text: T-t-t-take that, snake.

name: perhapsmaybe
text: I never thought snakes were such wusses

name: i_love_kate
text: Do not speak ill of the dead!

name: mystkmanat
text:
Dear i_love_kate:

I have chubbied you more than anyone else, ever.

PS- This is probably thanks in part to your avatar. It always makes me want to settle down on the couch with Futurama and a pineapple.

name: atilla
text: No, seriously, it dies after getting straight up blown in half. With that lack of fortitude he can say whatever he wants about it.

name: mercuri0us
text: He was just trying to bullshit them.

name: mortshire
text: i have mixed feelings about the outcome of this strip.

name: nexus
text:
Don't, it's awesome.

Also, thank you kahrytes

name: i_love_kate
text: Kahrytes, what news from the North?

name: woodenteeth
text: M-m-m-m-mostly I just made a dead snake happen.

name: mashisoyo
text: Man I just love this joke so much.

name: ambala
text: AHHHHHHH

name: m3funkyb
text: oOoOoooOOOOo little sssnaaaake

name: craigola
text: Doesn't Todd just fucking know about snakes?

name: sargasm
text: Is this the first strip with alt text?

name: stuart
text: No, but this year was.

name: epicurus
text:
"Jeez, what month is it?"
We have all been there.

name: professorhazard
text: All the squirrel voices are read in my head as a sort of Chipmunks-ized falsetto. Little Freddie is significantly more high-pitched than Todd. Blister, I think, is Patrick Warburton run through a Chipmunks filter.

name: radarjammer
text: Funny, I always read Nice Pete like that.

name: gitarooman
text: nice pete? what the fuck? nice pete has a deep voice with a west virginian accent. i do the same thing with the squirrels though.

name: tombsgrave
text: The snake is obliterated by the tiny handgun.  It must have rat-shot.

name: norrin
text: Snake-shot?

name: 1000hz
text:
A snake in the wintertime
Its skin so beady
The air so cold

A humble request
A sentimental cry
A squirrel with a luger

Ohhhhhh shiiiiiit.

name: waldo913
text:
Chubbied, however from the profile, it looks more like a Browning Hi-Power or a 1911 with a compensator...

Luger certainly fits the meter of the poem better.

name: spectre
text: It's a riff on the old story of the girl who finds a dying snake, so she takes him in and nurses him back to health, whereupon he bites her. As she's dying, she asks him "Why?" and he says, "You knew what I was when you took me in."

name: deusoma
text: Oooh, I heard that one in the form of a frog swimming a scorpion across a river, and both drowning because the scorpion stings the frog.

name: cdl146
text: Alt text: Squirrels and snakes are natural enemies; Todd finds that he has done a doubly good deed.

name: greymantledwolf
text: cats with squirrel friends even thinking of inviting a snake to live with them = dinosaurs with human friends even thinking of inviting a crocodile to live with them.

name: professorhazard
text: The snake can talk; dogs cannot. What does it all mean.

name: cailetshadow
text:
ahem

Todd T
Blister
Scamper
Banjo
Tommy G

the under represented squirrel population of achewood.

name: dicklaurent
text: Don't forget Downtown Danny!

name: cailetshadow
text: ...and the Man In the Snake, Little Freddy :p

name: hollybones
text: Ricky Nihoha.

name: cailetshadow
text: good call, good call. this is sort of becoming an achewood squirrel-name wiki, here.

name: dovey
text: This is a good thing you are doing here.

name: professorhazard
text: It is probably safe to assume that Fat Slimmy, whose tires were in need of rotation, is a squirrel.

name: gumfish
text: [i]erf[/]

name: gumfish
text: Well fuck. I couldn't have done that worse if I'd written HEY GUYS LOOK IT SAYS ERF I LIKE ERF THATS A GOOD ONE YEAH

name: al_batross
text: Where's the roller skate?

name: coco
text: I find it highly amusing that Todd's packing . . . and yet I'm not surprised.

name: hamscout
text:
Does this mean that Teodor and Mr. Bear are both parselmouths?

Todd scores one for Gryffindor!

name: mystkmanat
text: Chubbied for your unabashed nerdiness.  (in a good way)

name: em2
text: I love the singular, vector graphics nature of the snake. Just one solid object.

name: emu
text: I don't know if anyone else pointed this out but I always assumed the little snake was in a snake skin.

name: ketelcat
text: I always thought this was Little Freddie pulling a con, pretending to be a snake. Alt text set me straight on this!

name: bassguitarbill
text: I like Todd's squirrel-sized pistol.

name: shutup_shutup
text: I'm ... a ... snaaaaaaaake!
